page.title: 07FASHION
page.content: Today there are many fashionable clothes. At the moment the craze is flower power for girls and famous jumpers such as Kappa's for boys. Also a lot of boys wear trainers such as Puma, Nike,Diadora and Dunlop. Tracksuits such as Fila, Rochini and Tochini are also worn. Girls wear baggy trousers and shirts with flat jelly shoes and bags. They also wear brightly fluorescent coloured socks,gloves,nailvarnish and ribbons. Still however, a lot of the sixty's fashions are repeated. Flairs will soon be back in fashion but I promise that you won't catch me wearing them.
